<CsoundSynthesizer> <CsOptions> ; Select audio/midi flags here according to platform ; Audio out Audio in No messages -odac -iadc -d ;;;RT audio I/O ; For Non-realtime ouput leave only the line below: ; -o prealloc.wav -W ;;; for file output any platform </CsOptions> <CsInstruments>
; Initialize the global variables. sr = 44100 kr = 4410 ksmps = 10 nchnls = 1
; Pre-allocate memory for five instances of Instrument #1. prealloc 1, 5
; Instrument #1 instr 1 ; Generate a waveform, get the cycles per second from the 4th p-field. a1 oscil 6500, p4, 1 out a1 endin
</CsInstruments> <CsScore>
; Just generate a nice, ordinary sine wave. f 1 0 32768 10 1
; Play five instances of Instrument #1 for one second. ; Note that 4th p-field contains cycles per second. i 1 0 1 220 i 1 0 1 440 i 1 0 1 880 i 1 0 1 1320 i 1 0 1 1760 e
</CsScore> </CsoundSynthesizer>
